snippet: The artist, Alice Aycock, contends that Terminal 1's managers will violate their contract with her if they follow through with plans to remove a large piece she was commissioned to make 14 years ago.
abstract: The artist, Alice Aycock, contends that Terminal 1's managers will violate their contract with her if they follow through with plans to remove a large piece she was commissioned to make 14 years ago.

headline.main: Arbitrator to Hear Artist's Plea Over Airport Sculpture
